title: S3 Ep87: Take A Walk On The Dark Side w/ R. Gary Patterson - Hr. 3
itunes:title: Take A Walk On The Dark Side w/ R. Gary Patterson - Hr. 3
description:
Author/Researcher R. Gary Patterson Joins Darkness Radio for two hours to talk first about the conspiracy of the supposed "death" of Paul McCartney of the Beatles and his replacement by a totally different person who took his place and name

Then,  Gary Talks with us about the infamous 27 Club, the one club that most Rock and Rollers don't want to belong to!  Rockers who have mysteriously passed away at the age of 27, and it all may have been started with one deal with the devil!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
